author: Staff Reporter
text:
Fast Track Mahila Court Judge J. Flora on Tuesday sentenced an accused to undergo one-year rigorous imprisonment.

According to prosecution, S. Devadasan Robert (30) of Sathankulam was found guilty of raping a 23-year-old woman after trespassing into her house in the same area when she was alone.

While the victim’s father, Thangaiah (70), tried to prevent him, the accused assaulted him with an iron rod.

Later, he also attacked the victim.

The incident occurred on November 9, 2013. Sathankulam police had registered a case.

Fine imposed

The judge also imposed a fine of Rs. 10,000 on the accused.

Half of the fine amount was ordered to be awarded to the woman as compensation.
title: 30-year-old gets one-year RI for raping woman
